EmailTemplate.name: Action Plan Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Plan Agreement Available for Review and Signing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!ClientCase__c.PrimaryClient__c},
I hope this message finds you well.
This email is to inform you that the Action Plan agreement from your recent counseling session is now available for your review and signature.
Action Plan Details:
Purpose: [Brief description of the purpose or objectives of the Action Plan]
Key Objectives: [List key objectives or actions planned]
Next Steps: [Any additional information about what to do next]
Please log in to the portal and to review the document [under My Service → View Details → Manage Document] or in the attached PDF and sign it at your earliest convenience.
If you have any questions or require further clarification regarding the Action Plan, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Title}
{!User.Email} {!label.AgencyAddress}
